Package com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.player.ability

Class Ability<T extends Ability<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.player.ability.Ability<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the subclass type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
TeleportAbility
public abstract class Ability<T extends Ability<T>> extends Object implements StateHolder
The ability class. Made for players to do stuff like teleporting.
Since:
0.0.0
